data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Gariaband, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 will die without Jesus in the next month in Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage the church of Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Gond Maria people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Gond Maria people.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 116 believers in Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Please, teach the 116 believers in Gariaband, Chhattisgarh, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

location.name: Gariaband
location.people_groups_list: Gond Ghotul Muria, Chitara, Halba Kewat, Gond Kandra, Gond Dorla
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gond Ghotul Muria (21,000), Chitara (5,100), Halba Kewat (4,100), Gond Kandra (17,000), Gond Dorla (161,000)
